pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared Posts = let
  Source = Sql.Database("vmsql01\SQL_NSOD", "StackOverflow2010"),
  Navigation = Source{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "PostTypes"]}[Data]
in
  Navigation;
shared DefaultModelStorage = let
  DefaultModelStorage = Pipeline.DefaultModelStorage()
in
  DefaultModelStorage;
shared DestinationForWriteToDatabaseTableFrom_Posts = let
  Pattern = Lakehouse.Contents([]),
  Navigation_1 = Pattern{[workspaceId = "a6df6f51-7555-4607-a7a8-b56e284c62d1"]}[Data],
  Navigation_2 = Navigation_1{[lakehouseId = "f1f27e23-4e5d-4147-bfb9-de187b982eff"]}[Data],
  TableNavigation = Navigation_2{[Id = "Posts", ItemKind = "Table"]}[Data]
in
  TableNavigation;
[Staging = "DefaultModelStorage"]
shared WriteToDatabaseTableFrom_TransformForOutputToDatabaseTableFrom_Posts = let
  WriteToDatabaseTableFrom_TransformForOutputToDatabaseTableFrom_Posts = Pipeline.ExecuteAction(ValueAction.WithTransaction([Target = DestinationForWriteToDatabaseTableFrom_Posts], (txn) => {TableAction.DeleteRows(txn[Target]), TableAction.InsertRows(txn[Target], TransformForOutputToDatabaseTableFrom_Posts), Action.DoNothing}))
in
  WriteToDatabaseTableFrom_TransformForOutputToDatabaseTableFrom_Posts;
shared TransformForOutputToDatabaseTableFrom_Posts = let
    ColumnMappings = {[SourceColumnName = "ID", DestinationColumnName = "Id"], [SourceColumnName = "AcceptedAnswerId", DestinationColumnName = "AcceptedAnswerId"], [SourceColumnName = "AnswerCount", DestinationColumnName = "AnswerCount"], [SourceColumnName = "Body", DestinationColumnName = "Body"], [SourceColumnName = "ClosedDate", DestinationColumnName = "ClosedDate"], [SourceColumnName = "CommentCount", DestinationColumnName = "CommentCount"], [SourceColumnName = "CommunityOwnedDate", DestinationColumnName = "CommunityOwnedDate"], [SourceColumnName = "CreationDate", DestinationColumnName = "CreationDate"], [SourceColumnName = "FavoriteCount", DestinationColumnName = "FavoriteCount"], [SourceColumnName = "LastActivityDate", DestinationColumnName = "LastActivityDate"], [SourceColumnName = "LastEditDate", DestinationColumnName = "LastEditDate"], [SourceColumnName = "LastEditorDisplayName", DestinationColumnName = "LastEditorDisplayName"], [SourceColumnName = "LastEditorUserId", DestinationColumnName = "LastEditorUserId"], [SourceColumnName = "ParentId", DestinationColumnName = "ParentId"], [SourceColumnName = "PostTypeId", DestinationColumnName = "PostTypeId"], [SourceColumnName = "Score", DestinationColumnName = "Score"], [SourceColumnName = "Tags", DestinationColumnName = "Tags"], [SourceColumnName = "Title", DestinationColumnName = "Title"], [SourceColumnName = "ViewCount", DestinationColumnName = "ViewCount"]},
    SourceColumns = Table.SelectColumns(Posts, List.Transform(ColumnMappings, each _[SourceColumnName])),
    TargetColumns = Table.RenameColumns(SourceColumns, List.Transform(ColumnMappings, each {_[SourceColumnName], _[DestinationColumnName]}))
in
    TargetColumns;
